title: Gun accidentally fired during gun and knife show, strikes patron
content:
A patron refused help from emergency personnel after they were accidentally struck by a bullet at a gun show in Atlanta.
Atlanta Police said a person accidentally discharged the gun, firing at the floor during the Atlanta Gun and Knife Show at the Atlanta Expo Center on Jonesboro Rd. on Saturday. The bullet ricocheted and a fragment struck the patron.
No one was charged in the incident.
The Atlanta Gun and Knife show continues until Sunday at 5 p.m.
"If you are a gun collector, or are a hunting enthusiast, the gun show at the Atlanta Expo Center in Atlanta, GA is a great place to spend some time," the promoter's website for the event says. "Safety is first at all of RK Shows Events, so we will have security and check-in points for the safety of our attendees and vendors."
